TextBlock.Text: SOLANUM: We finally found the Eye. My clan would be happy for that, but not me.
SOLANUM: I am thankful for your vision, now I know exactly why it was not easy to find. Those strangers from other star system, they knew everything about the Eye of universe, I wish we could too.
SOLANUM: Who knows how many other intelligent life forms it have lured? I think I don't want to know anything more about it. Even in childhood I knew that it's not waiting for us or anyone else.
SOLANUM: .. Is that Memory Statue active? I wish Ramie could see this. I want to check it's connection with Ash Twin Project.
